name: CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Documents
description: Rule containing data for ResidentialPermit documents.Table:CMGT_EXT_DATA_Documents
sail_code:
/*The below is the structure definition of the map used in this rule*/
/*a!map(
name:Defines the display name of the document,
referenceName: should match the name of the Appian Document, needs to have the app prefix for cloning
description:Defines description of the document
caseTitle:Case title to which the document should be mapped
 */
a!localVariables(
  local!maps:{
    /*Residential Permit  */
    /*Solar Permit  */
    a!map(
      name: "Site Plan for Solar Expansion in Residential Areas",
      description: "A site plan document is a detailed drawing that provides an overview of a specific piece of land or property.",
      caseTitle: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Survey Results",
      description: "Summary or report presenting the results and analysis of a survey conducted.",
      caseTitle: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Environmental Impact Assessment for Permit Solar",
      description: "Evaluates the ecological effects of solar projects, ensuring responsible development and adherence to environmental regulations.",
      caseTitle: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Guidance for Residential Solar Permit",
      description: "Formal document outlining the guidance for setting up and the benefits of the solar set-up.",
      caseTitle: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Financial Statement",
      description: "Statement or report presenting the financial status, transactions, or assets related.",
      caseTitle: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Structural Criteria for Solar Permit",
      description: "Document summarizing the structural criteria of solar set-up.",
      caseTitle: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Electrical layout for Solar Expansion in Residential Areas",
      description: "Document summarizing the electrical layout of solar set-up.",
      caseTitle: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Court Order",
      description: "Official court-issued document outlining specific instructions, decisions, or directives pertaining.",
      caseTitle: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Site Plan for Commercial Solar Farm Approval",
      description: "A site plan document is a detailed drawing that provides an overview of a specific piece of land or property.",
      caseTitle: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Electrical layout for Commercial Solar Farm Approval",
      description: "Document summarizing the electrical layout of solar set-up.",
      caseTitle: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Technical Specifications for Permit Solar",
      description: "Provide detailed parameters and requirements, ensuring safe and efficient installation of solar energy systems in compliance with regulations.",
      caseTitle: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Community Outreach Document for Permit Solar",
      description: "Engages stakeholders, communicating project details and benefits, fostering collaboration, and addressing community concerns.",
      caseTitle: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Financial Statement for Commercial Solar Farm Approval",
      description: "Statement or report presenting the financial status, transactions, or assets related.",
      caseTitle: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Permit Applications for Solar Permit",
      description: "Solar Permit Applications streamline the approval process for solar projects,facilitating the installation of solar energy systems.",
      caseTitle: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Operation and Maintenance Plan for Permit Solar",
      description: "Outlines procedures to ensure the efficient, safe, and compliant operation of solar energy systems, maximizing performance and longevity.",
      caseTitle: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Environmental Impact Assessment for Permit Solar",
      description: "Evaluates the ecological effects of solar projects, ensuring responsible development and adherence to environmental regulations.",
      caseTitle: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval"
    ),
    /*Additions Permit*/
    a!map(
      name: "Property Survey for Residential Permit",
      description: "Assesses land characteristics, boundaries, and topography, ensuring accurate planning and compliance with local building regulations.",
      caseTitle: "Urban Oasis Residence"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Environmental Impact Assessment for Residential Permit",
      description: "Evaluates project effects on the environment, ensuring compliance with regulations and sustainable development practices.",
      caseTitle: "Urban Oasis Residence"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Application Form for Residential Permit",
      description: "Gathers crucial details for construction projects, ensuring compliance with local regulations and safety standards.",
      caseTitle: "Urban Oasis Residence"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Building Plans for Residential Permit",
      description: "Detail the architectural and structural aspects of a project, ensuring compliance with local codes for safe and approved construction.",
      caseTitle: "Urban Oasis Residence"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Contractor Information for Residential Permit",
      description: "Includes essential details about the contractor and the project, ensuring compliance with regulations and facilitating the permit approval process.",
      caseTitle: "Urban Oasis Residence"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Financial Statement For Urban Oasis",
      description: "Statement or report presenting the financial status, transactions, or assets related.",
      caseTitle: "Urban Oasis Residence"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Zoning Approval Document",
      description: "A zoning approval document is an official certification issued by a local zoning authority or municipality.",
      caseTitle: "Urban Oasis Residence"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Foundation Report",
      description: "A foundation report document provides a comprehensive assessment of the structural foundation of a building or structure.",
      caseTitle: "Urban Oasis Residence"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Site Plan",
      description: "A site plan document is a detailed drawing that provides an overview of a specific piece of land or property.",
      caseTitle: "Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Revamping a Downtown Retreat for Contemporary Living",
      description: "Discover the innovative design solutions used to revitalize a city-center retreat, crafting a harmonious blend of sophistication and functionality.",
      caseTitle: "Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Financial Statement of Downtown retreat",
      description: "Statement or report presenting the financial status, transactions, or assets related.",
      caseTitle: "Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Zoning Approval Document",
      description: "A zoning approval document is an official certification issued by a local zoning authority or municipality.",
      caseTitle:"Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Foundation Report",
      description: "A foundation report document provides a comprehensive assessment of the structural foundation of a building or structure.",
      caseTitle: "Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Renovating a Downtown Retreat for Urban Living",
      description: "Evaluates transformation of a downtown sanctuary into a chic, cosmopolitan space, marrying sleek design with cozy comfort for the ultimate urban lifestyle.",
      caseTitle: "Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Retreat Renovation Procedures",
      description: "Gathers crucial details for renovating a city-center sanctuary, from demolition to decoration, showcasing the craftsmanship.",
      caseTitle: "Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "Techniques for Revitalizing Downtown Retreats",
      description: "Detail the methods and technologies utilized to renovate a downtown oasis, optimizing space, functionality, and aesthetics to create a haven in the heart of the city.",
      caseTitle: "Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    ),
    a!map(
      name: "The Downtown Retreat Renovation Journey",
      description: "Includes evolution of a downtown sanctuary through each stage of the renovation process",
      caseTitle: "Downtown Retreat Renovation"
    )
  },
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    local!maps,
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    fv!item,
    "referenceName",
    concat(cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_APP_PREFIX," ",fv!item.name)
  )
)
)
